chapters.title: Chapter 5: To Require a Boon
chapters.info: King Paitar Nachiman, p. 158—King of Arafel, brother of Kiruna. His face is creased, and most of his hair is gone with only a ribbon of gray hair remaining on his head, though he was once stunningly handsome. He is tall. He has a deep voice, broad shoulders, and an intimidating demeanor. His favorite granddaughter is married to Ethenielle's son. See also Nachiman, Kiruna.
